nodes.text: A Seneschal was a position in the royal houses of Brentaal.
Sival Brentioch was the seneschal of House Brentaal, while at the same time was able to act as his own errand boy as a disguise.

The title of seneschal is a historical title used by the houses of nobles during the Middle Ages in Europe, usually referring to an officer with responsibilities similar to that of a majordomo. Occasionally the title would refer to an officer with judicial or military administration.
